page.title: 08HEALTH CARE IN BURWELL.
page.content: {School Nurse. Our school nurse deals with head lice,teeth,vision_testing,hands(finger nails).In Burwell she also weighs the babies at the Red House Clinic.She deals with our school, Burwell Village College, and also lots more in the area. {Doctors.} Four doctors and a District Nurse work from the High Street Surgery known as{The Red House.}It was an old house which the Council converted. Two of the doctors are volunteers belonging to {MAGPAS}(Mid-Anglia General Practitioners' Accident Service). They are called by radio to the scene of road accidents in the area. {Blood Donation. {The Regional Transfusion Service}comes to{Gardiner Memorial Hall}regularly.
